recipe.title: PG-13 Singapore Sling
instructions: Combine 3/4 cup pomegranate juice, 1/2 cup mango juice, 1/2 cup pineapple juice, and 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice in a pitcher filled with ice and stir until cold. Divide among 4 Collins glasses filled with crushed ice and add 2-3 ounces tonic water to each. Garnish with mint sprigs.
